name: Wizards & Warlocks
description:
Brief description

Wizards & Warlocks is a multiplayer team-based FPS where players will fight for the grail of the deads.

Each Team has the objective of defeat the whole enemy team and defend/steal the grail. Warlocks defend and Wizards steal.

Wizards & Warlocks counts with a huge combination of Spells, Traps and Potions which will increase its replayability and tactical gameplay.

Everything in this game has been entirely developed by Students.
